titles.title: Biodiesel and Renewable Diesel Incentive Extension Act of 2016
Biodiesel and Renewable Diesel Incentive Extension Act of 2016
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend biodiesel and renewable diesel incentives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Biodiesel and Renewable Diesel Incentive Extension Act of 2016
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2018: (1) the income tax credit for biodiesel and renewable diesel used as fuel, (2) the excise tax credit for biodiesel mixtures, and (3) the payments that are equivalent to the biodiesel mixture excise tax credit.
